gui.portablecobblestonegenerator.title: Portable Cobblestone Generator
status.pcg.triggermethod.1: Stops working when activated by redstone
info.pcg.triggermethod.change: Trigger method has been changed to: §a
tiptext.trigger_corrector.line2: §bShift + Left Click §7to change the mechanical trigger mode
tiptext.pcg.line1: §7Portable industrial stone-making machine.Can operate without power, but efficiency is low and upgrades cannot be installed.
tiptext.trigger_corrector.line3: §7Can be used to change the trigger method when a machine receives a redstone signal.
tiptext.basic_hfst.line1: §7Use fuel to supply heat to other machinery.
tiptext.basic_hfst.line2: Compatible with machinery:§a Basic Blast Furnace
patchouli.guide.name: AutoCraft Integration Manual
patchouli.guide.landing_text: Welcome to AutoCraft. This is a mod focused on achieving full automation of mainstream item production, and it also features unique automation development content.
